title: Hometown Plumbing Sewer & Drain Inc.
address: 160 E Norris Rd Suite C, Bakersfield, CA 93308

reviews.Name: Josiah Benjermin Thomas (Josiah Thomas)
reviews.Description: The toilet in my apartment was acting funky last week, so I put in a work order with my management company. I missed a call from Marina at Hometown Plumbing. When I was finally able to return the call, Marina was super helpful and very efficient with getting me scheduled. Friendliness is so underrated today, and I really appreciated the brief conversation we shared. She scheduled Michael to come out and take a look at the issue. Michale arrived on the dot and was also very friendly. He quickly diagnosed the issue, fixed it, picked up after himself, and gave a little advice. Michael was very attentive and conscious of my home. I'd totally recommend Hometown Plumbing for any of plumbing needs.

reviews.Name: Carrie Patino
reviews.Description: Best experience!! Everyone is so nice.Michael was so helpful and knowledgeable. He explained everything step by step so I understood what needed to be done.Had our new hot water heater installed and working in no time. I will definitely use Hometown for all repairs in the future!!

reviews.Name: Potential Spam
reviews.Description:
Had a main water supply to sprinkler inlet problem. Employee Tyler showed up on time was very efficient and did great job.
We always use hometown plumbing for any of our plumbing needs, very professional and very courteous. Definitely five stars!

reviews.Name: Miho Shimura
reviews.Description: I was happily surprised that a plumber was able to come out within the hour to fix a problem at my parents’ house. Kevin was knowledgeable, courteous, and efficient. The dispatcher was all of these things too. My friend recommended them to me, and I will recommend too! Thank you for your help today!

reviews.Name: Tessa Williams
reviews.Description: I woke up this morning to a waterfall coming out of the light fixtures in my kitchen. Not the best way to start the day! I called Hometown Plumbing and they had someone out within less than an hour. Kevin was so kind and professional! He was quick to fix the immediate problem and gave us a few options for long term solutions. We have a long road ahead of us but I am so grateful to Hometown Plumbing for their quick response and knowledgeable solutions. I would highly recommend them for any plumbing needs!

reviews.Name: Golden Empire
reviews.Description: Toilet was wobbly so we took it off and found out the flange was broken. This was above my husband’s pay grade. So I called Hometown plumbing got an appointment for them to come and fix it. I immediately got a text, saying Aaron would be out between 3 pm and 430pm today. Aaron called me at 1:30 and asked if he could come early. After getting to our house and assessing the problem he quickly figured out a plan. After removing the old flange found, we had a big chunk of concrete missing. Aaron talked to my husband about what he had planned and how to fix it. Next thing we knew the concrete was fixed. The new flange was installed and he even installed our Toilet. Can’t ask for anything better than a quick response, honest, and hard working. We will definitely use Hometown plumbing again in the future if a need arises.Thank you Aaron.

reviews.Name: Robin
reviews.Description: We had a slow flushing toilet due to tree roots in the line. James arrived on time. He was professional, courteous, and cleaned up the area when he finished. We are very pleased with Hometown Plumbing!

reviews.Name: Allan Dacosta
reviews.Description: I have used Hometown Plumbing and few times and they have never failed me..this time it was 2 things and they came through with flying colors..Tyler was great and handled both projects..he was professional and knowledgeable of what I needed done ..thank you for the great work.

review_summary: Hometown Plumbing consistently receives positive reviews for its friendly, efficient, and professional service. Customers praise the quick response times, knowledgeable technicians (Michael, Tyler, Kevin, James, and Aaron are specifically mentioned), and thorough work, including clean-up.  They are recommended for various plumbing needs, from minor repairs to complex installations, and are considered reliable and trustworthy.

title: Kangarooter Plumbing & Septic

reviews.Name: Dianna Garcia
reviews.Description: Our Home Warranty doesn’t cover Septic Tank in our area. My husband and I remembered this company because they work on apartments across the street from us. The guys who came to work on our Tank were so nice and friendly. The one guy explained everything to my husband. Lorie? The office representative was extremely nice and worked with us on the payment. Would we recommend? A huge YES. They were far more from what we expected. Thank you KANGAROOTER for helping us first time customers.

reviews.Name: Jesse Cleveland Jr
reviews.Description: We have used them for many years now..and they have always fixed the problem and very professional from start to finish.Very experienced crew and have solved Any problems we had with Sewer and septic.We want to thank all the folks from Kangarooter .Thank you guys..From the Clevelands

reviews.Name: Brandon Munoz
reviews.Description: They're always quick and extremely professional. We just had our septic done this morning and both operators were extremely personable and very professional. They dug that hole 20 times faster than I ever could and we're in and out quick with doing a very professional job. The area looked perfectly flat as they found it. I always use kangarooter because they're extremely proficient and you could trust the service operators. I will definitely recommend them to anyone who needs these type of services.

reviews.Name: Jim Ballard
reviews.Description: Been a client for over 5 years,, now that they have a new office manager or receptionist. My experience has been terrible. I love the plumber who comes out and does my work Tom he is a good hard-working man, but the experience I had with the office clerk is horrible. Charge me $95 to replace the insides of a toilet for less than 10 minutes worth of work.

reviews.Name: Paul Haushalter
reviews.Description: Tom is the best and always takes care of business. Solves problems fast.

reviews.Name: Brenda Greenwood
reviews.Description: Kangarooter pumped and certified our septic system when we were selling our home. They were on time and completed the work quickly and thoroughly for the price quoted over the phone.  Lori, in the office, was extremely responsive to provide the necessary documentation to our escrow agent.  It was a very good and refreshing experience.  I highly recommend this business.

reviews.Name: christina fuentes
reviews.Description: Best prices great service very nice gentlemen.

reviews.Name: Jodi Jensen
reviews.Description:
I have used this company for the last 15 years for personal use and, also as a Sub Contractor for Custom Homes that we have built.  They have always been punctual, reasonable in pricing, professional, and best of all - Chuck is always laughing, has a positive attitude, and he is so enjoyable to have on site and work around.
Thanks for the great work Kangarooter!

review_summary:
Kangarooter Plumbing & Septic receives overwhelmingly positive reviews, highlighting:

*   **Excellent service:** Professional, efficient, and thorough work on septic and sewer issues.
*   **Friendly and knowledgeable staff:** Technicians are personable and explain the work.
*   **Positive office experience:** Lori is praised for being helpful and responsive.
*   **Reliable and experienced:** Long-term customers consistently recommend them.
*   **Fair pricing:** Competitive prices and accurate quotes.
*   **Punctuality:** Services are completed on time.
*   **Specific praise:** Tom and Chuck are frequently mentioned as excellent employees.
*   **Negative Feedback:** One customer had a negative experience with the office clerk.

title: Bakersfield Plumbing Company

reviews.Name: Isa Pulido
reviews.Description:
THANK YOU! Professional Review for Bakersfield Plumbing – Repipe Job in Kern County.

We recently had the pleasure of working with Bakersfield Plumbing for a full repipe job, and we couldn't be more satisfied with the results. From start to finish, their team demonstrated exceptional professionalism, expertise, and attention to detail. Thank you to the owner Tony in advance and we appreciate the dedicated team you put together, Jason the Foreman was fantastic. We couldn’t be more happier working and communicating with you and your team. Your experience moves mountains and you surely know how to run and complete a job that was done in an amazingly successful fast time! Thank you for ensuring city permits were pulled and available for us for reference and copy.

The project was completed on time and within budget, with clear communication throughout the process. The crew was highly skilled, ensuring minimal disruption to our property while delivering high-quality workmanship. Their knowledge of plumbing systems and dedication to customer satisfaction were evident in every step of the job.

We highly recommend Bakersfield Plumbing for anyone in need of repiping services and or plumbing services. Their reliability, efficiency, and commitment to excellence set them apart in the industry in the Central Valley and Kern County. Thank you again! God bless you all.

reviews.Name: Charles Finley
reviews.Description:
A-1 Plumbing in Bakersfield provided one of the most unprofessional and outright disappointing service experiences imaginable. From the owner down to the employees, their behavior was completely unacceptable. Not only did they fail to complete the plumbing repair correctly, but they also caused significant damage to my cabinetry and failed to properly repair the wall. Instead of addressing the issue professionally, they laughed, made a complete mess, and disrespected my home.

To make matters worse, their attitude was nothing short of appalling. They openly made rude comments about my dog, even going as far as to say they would throw them out. The lack of professionalism and basic respect was beyond frustrating.

This so-called “mom-and-pop” plumbing company operates in an outdated, careless, and unaccountable manner, showing no regard for their customers or their property. Their dismissive and rude behavior, combined with subpar workmanship, makes it clear that they should not be trusted with any plumbing job. If you value quality service, respect, and professionalism, avoid A-1 Plumbing in Bakersfield at all costs

reviews.Name: Christopher Tovar
reviews.Description: I have had the best experiences with Bakersfield Plumbing. They’ve been timely, professional, and to be honest the best value. I’m completely satisfied with the quality of their work and services they provide. I highly recommend them. Today they replaced my malfunctioning water heater.

reviews.Name: Derrell Victory
reviews.Description: Called the phone number on a Sunday afternoon and got in touch with Jerry who was on call. He told me the rates and I agreed and he came out about an hour and a half later. He was able to fix my water main line that had broken and now I have no leaks. Highly recommended. Very professional. Thank you very much Jerry for your great work and service! Customer for life if I ever need you guys.

reviews.Name: Tony Keys
reviews.Description: My main water line broke under my concrete driveway. The guys came out and got busy cutting the concrete and digging to the pipe. It was deep. Lots of work. Put the correct repair part and refilled and cleaned up nicely. Very professional work. I’ll use this company again and recommend it.

reviews.Name: Lance Fooks
reviews.Description:
I am extremely satisfied with the work performed on my property! I needed drains cleared and a clean out installed. Jason was the field tech that came out and ran a camera through the pipe and assessed my situation. He explained everything in detail about what was needed and how the work would be done. He is knowledgeable, professional, respectful and answered all my questions. Those in the scheduling office were outstanding and had arranged for the job to be done the same day! The 2 man crew that came to do the work were great! I appreciate a job well done!

I was encouraged by a friend to call Bakersfield Plumbing CO and l'm glad l did!

reviews.Name: Deseret alvarez
reviews.Description: Jason was great. Friendly and knowledgeable! My main drain was clogged, they fit me in the same day and found the issue. Reasonably prices and got me back up and running! Thank you so much!

reviews.Name: Tim Roberts
reviews.Description: I had an emergency sewer line back up. They had a tech at my home quickly. He cleared the pipe and showed me with a scope, what was going on. A root or roots are collapsing my sewer line. Plus there was a ton of grease in the line going from the kitchen to the sewer. My home had been a rental before I bought it. Needless to say , they will be back to replace my sewer line. I got a good price on both the service call and for the replacing of the line. Very professional.  I will be recommending all my contacts to use them. Thank you for the great work and your professionalism.

review_summary:
Bakersfield Plumbing Company receives overwhelmingly positive reviews. Customers praise their professionalism, expertise, and attention to detail, particularly highlighting the team's efficiency and clear communication. Specific commendations include:

*   **Repiping:** Successful and timely completion of repipe jobs, with adherence to budget and permit requirements.
*   **General Plumbing:** Timely service, including water heater replacement, water main repairs, drain clearing, and sewer line inspections/replacements.
*   **Staff:** Praised for their knowledge, friendliness, and professionalism, with specific mentions of Jason (Foreman and field tech) and Jerry.
*   **Value:** Considered to offer the best value for services.
*   **Overall:** Highly recommended for various plumbing needs, with customers expressing satisfaction and intent to use the company again.

In contrast, a review of A-1 Plumbing in Bakersfield describes a highly negative experience, citing unprofessional behavior, poor workmanship, and damage to property.

title: Payless Plumbing & Rooter

reviews.Name: Nichole Nance
reviews.Description: The leak from my shower handles is now fixed. The new fixtures are great the caulking work was nice and clean. Always does a great job when I call them out. Thank you to our plumber Bryant B. Before and after. Thank you so much for doing such great work. This is why we are loyal and stick with this company.

reviews.Name: William Burden
reviews.Description:
Bryant was friendly and did an amazing job.
He got set up and started as soon as he arrived. Kept me informed on each step of the job.

reviews.Name: Anthony
reviews.Description: Ian very pleased with the job that Justin did with the job. He explained everything that he was going to do the night before. He would go over everything the next morning. He was easy to work with and professional.

reviews.Name: Lynn Lynn
reviews.Description:
I had an excellent experience with Payless Plumbing & Rooter from start to finish. They were perfectly able to accommodate my work schedule and their communication was excellent. Justin the plumber fixed my problem(s) not only in a timely manner but with three noisy and annoying fur babies trying to supervise him!
I greatly appreciate his kindness and professionalism. The price was truly reasonable and I am happy knowing that I now  will have no stress in knowing who to call.

reviews.Name: Matthew Futter
reviews.Description: All-star tech Bryant brought us immense peace of mind on our emergency Sunday call today. We found a leak coming from inside a wall, and he came prepared with everything he needed to cut into the wall (carefully and locally after hearing the background and doing a little detective work of his own on-site) and fix the leak. Bryant was careful with the drywall he removed, so I can reinstall and seal it once everything dries out. He answered our questions patiently and thoroughly before leaving us with a clean fix and a secure home. Both helpful and friendly when we called the after-hours line, he made us feel like we’d called the right company, and once we ended the call, he got here fast, too! With zero attempted upsells and a terrific attitude the whole time, Bryant has definitely earned our business for the next time we need a plumber.

reviews.Name: Jessica Flores
reviews.Description: I reached out on Sunday and I left a voice mail. I didn't expect for anyone to reach out to me that day but I received a call from one of the plumbers which was a great surprise. I explained to him what was going on and he said he was available that same day but he was on double time. I told him it wasn't emergent and would be willing to wait for a weekday for regular pricing. The following day, Kim reached out to me and scheduled me an appointment for Tuesday. SADLY, I wasn't home that day, but my husband was. He liked the service and was pleased. Devin was very informative, polite and respectful he said.

reviews.Name: Roxanne Collins
reviews.Description: I had a great experience with Payless Plumbing and Rooter. Each step of the way I was happy. Great communication, reasonable price and most importantly my issue was fixed! The technician, Bryant Benford was very knowledgeable, professional and friendly. I’ll definitely be calling this company for any future plumbing needs!

reviews.Name: Maria Murray
reviews.Description: Justin was friendly, professional and proficient.  He immediately went about disconnecting and removing my water heater. He and Aaron completed the job of installing the new one so I could have hot water restored to my residence after 48 hours without.  They referred me to have someone (Alert Disaster) come to look at the damage to the wall beside and behind it, as water had been leaking all around for 3 hours.  I do not hesitate to recommend Payless Plumbing for your home emergency or plumbing issues.

review_summary: Payless Plumbing & Rooter provides excellent service, with customers praising their communication, professionalism, and reasonable prices. Technicians like Bryant and Justin are frequently mentioned for their friendliness, knowledge, and efficiency in fixing various plumbing issues, including leaks, fixture installations, and water heater replacements. The company is responsive, even on weekends, and accommodates customer schedules. They are recommended for both emergency and general plumbing needs.

title: Precision Plumbing and Drain

reviews.Name: Pedro Mancia
reviews.Description: Jake was highly professional and did an excellent job. He repaired my kitchen faucet and fixed a toilet leak quickly and efficiently, all at a fair price. His communication, both over the phone and in person, was clear and helpful. I highly recommend this company!

reviews.Name: Joshua Porter
reviews.Description: I’ve been doing business with Precision Plumbing for the last couple of years. They have helped me on multiple remodeling jobs and emergency call out situations. Jake is a very experienced and knowledgeable plumber and his team follows his lead. I trust his judgment when plumbing issues arise. His scheduling app is state of the art and sends great reminders for appointments we have scheduled. His online invoices also make it easy to track and pay online. I always recommend Precision Plumbing !

reviews.Name: jenifer fernandez
reviews.Description:
This is the second time we have hired Precision Plumbing and Drain Inc. We initially hired them about 2 years ago to address a backup issue in our bathrooms, and Jake did such an excellent job that we didn't hesitate to call him again when we encountered a more pressing plumbing issue.

Jake was very responsive and honest about the extent of the damage to our main water line. His professionalism and transparency were truly appreciated, as it allowed us to make an informed decision without any surprises. The team that Jake assembled, including Stephen, was quick, efficient, and respectful throughout the entire process. They worked diligently to ensure that the job was completed to our satisfaction, and they were careful to minimize any disruption to our daily lives (as I work from home).

Overall, we are extremely satisfied with the services provided by Precision Plumbing.

We would highly recommend Precision Plumbing to anyone in need of plumbing services, whether for a minor repair or a major project. :)

reviews.Name: Denise Parks
reviews.Description: Jake and his coworker came to my house to unclog my washing machine drain pipe which was overflowing due to very old pipes which hadn't been cleared in many, many years. They arrived on time and got right to work. They were able to clear it sufficiently so that I could continue using my machine. He pointed out how really old the pipes were and would probably require further attention somewhere down the line. I had a lot happening in my life at the time and told him that I would definitely give him a call back to finish it up sometime in the near future. All in all, I  was very happy with the results and definitely will let my friends and family know about them if any of them need a good, reliable plumber.

reviews.Name: Michael Cebell
reviews.Description:
Steven, the plumber assigned to install new faucets, fix others, and install a shower assembly in our guest bathroom and a new master bedroom shower unit.
He was supremely capable, conscientious with how much time he spent in our home to minimize costs to us, and was a great asset to your company.
I would heartily recommend your company to any friend in need of plumbing service.

reviews.Name: Betty Peck
reviews.Description: Jake Wilson from Precision Plumbing and Drain was able to save me money by repairing the back flow.for my pool. He responded quickly to my call , was on time, and did a great job. The pool auto fill line has been working perfectly for several weeks now. I highly recommend him and his company!

reviews.Name: Tim Murry
reviews.Description: Stephen arrived early. Diagnosed the issue. Solved it quickly. He also installed a new faucet for me. This is my second time dealing with Stephen. He’s done a great job both times. I recommend Precision Plumbing and Stephen, if he’s the one handling the service call. They’re nice and friendly and easy to deal with. The price charged was fair and reasonable. I won’t hesitate to call Precision in the future.

reviews.Name: Jesse Jimenez
reviews.Description: Didn't know any plumbers in town and they were top on google search list. Very glad I found them, came by only a few hours after contacting them. Was able to get my kitchen sink back and working and a great price, much cheaper than the average cost google suggested it would cost. Very highly recommend.

review_summary:
Precision Plumbing and Drain receives consistently positive reviews. Key strengths include:

*   **Excellent Service:** Customers repeatedly praise the quality of work, efficiency, and responsiveness.
*   **Professionalism & Communication:** Plumbers are described as professional, communicative, and transparent.
*   **Fair Pricing:** Customers report reasonable and competitive pricing.
*   **Specific Plumbers:** Jake and Stephen are frequently mentioned and highly recommended.
*   **Wide Range of Services:** They handle various plumbing needs, from minor repairs to major projects.
*   **Convenience:** Easy scheduling, online invoicing, and prompt service are highlighted.

title: Titan Plumbing

reviews.Name: Jen W.
reviews.Description: I have used Titan Plumbing quite a few times over the years. There have been smaller jobs and major jobs they have worked on at our home. Every time we have called, they have been able to come out same day. We have had 2 major leaks in our home with one as recent as yesterday. When an emergency like that occurs, you want to know you have a company you can trust and count on and Titan Plumbing is definitely that company. The owners and all the employees make you feel like your job is important and they really care. When I call, I request Jason. He has been a plumber for 20+ years. He is very knowledgeable, knows what he is doing, and is always on your side. He is fast and efficient. I have had other employees come out to my home and have never had any issues with them either. Their reports are professional and detailed. I will continue to call Titan Plumbing because they give me peace of mind when I feel like everything has been turned upside down.

reviews.Name: Anna Murillo
reviews.Description: First-time customer. Titan came to the rescue when our regular plumber referred us, as they didn't have a snake long enough to do the job. Titan was there within a few hours and got the job done. We are grateful!

reviews.Name: Jennifer Biagi
reviews.Description: We have used this company multiple times. They come out quick and are always professional! They get it diagnosed and fixed right away! They are our first call for plumbing issues every time!

reviews.Name: Rita Isaac
reviews.Description: Carlos was very efficient & friendly, but professional. This is the second time I've used Titan Plumbing. If I have any other plumbing problems ( hopefully I wont) Titan will be my first call.

reviews.Name: Becca Fox
reviews.Description: GREAT customer service!! We had another local company come out. After a month we had the same problem. Titan came out fixed it at a reasonable price. The two gentlemen that came out was very kind and respectful to my 80-year-old mother

reviews.Name: Tim Guenther
reviews.Description: To say Luis did a wonderful job would be an understatement. He explained everything as he went, checked and double-checked connections and fittings, and even found a faulty brand new valve and brought it to my attention and replaced it right away. He shows that he cares about the customer and makes sure the job is done right. I'm definitely calling Titan Plumbing and asking for Luis next time!

reviews.Name: J Gradowitz
reviews.Description: The dispatcher was very friendly and so helpful when I initially booked the call to have my tankless water heater serviced. They were able to come out the next day and were very professional. Both the lead tech, Luis and his helper Carlos figured out the issue and charged me a fair price for the work. I definitely would recommend Titan as an honest and dependable plumbing company.

reviews.Name: Betty Walker
reviews.Description: I have been using Titan for my plumbing issues for a few years now.  The office staff are always friendly and accommodating.  The workman call when they are on their way, are courteous, and work efficiently.  I am very pleased with Titan.

review_summary:
*   **Reliable and Responsive:** Titan Plumbing provides fast, often same-day service for both small and major plumbing issues.
*   **Professional and Knowledgeable:** Technicians are experienced, efficient, and explain the work.
*   **Excellent Customer Service:** Friendly office staff, courteous technicians, and a focus on customer satisfaction.
*   **Trustworthy and Honest:** Customers appreciate the fair pricing, thorough work, and attention to detail.
*   **Recommended:** Many customers repeatedly use Titan Plumbing and recommend them.

title: The Plumbing Doc

reviews.Name: Garrett Zander
reviews.Description: After a week without hot water and getting the runaround from Advanced Plumbing, I called The Plumbing Doc desperate, and I’m so glad I did. From the moment I explained my situation, they completely rearranged their schedule to get a plumber to my house within two hours. Knowing I had already gone a week without hot water, Ronald went above and beyond—calling multiple plumbing part suppliers to track down the necessary parts and ensuring my water heater was repaired as quickly as possible. The level of customer service and dedication was outstanding. Thanks to Ronald and the team, my family finally has hot water again. Highly recommend The Plumbing Doc for their professionalism, responsiveness, and top-notch service!

reviews.Name: Bob Burdette
reviews.Description: When major plumbing issues arise, they are always  unexpected and unpleasant.  Our plumber saw the work was above his pay grade and recommended The Plumbing Doc. Our issue was at one of our investment properties. I was treated with empathy and updated along the way.  The estimate was detailed and understood.  Upon completion another call was made to me informing me of its completion.  Civility and professionalism are unexpected these days and I received both along with work done on a timely basis.  What else can we ask for. A job well done. Thank you.

reviews.Name: Nadra Halterman
reviews.Description: Friendly from start of call to Plumbing Doc. Service was fast, came within an hour. Senior discount. Service person knowledgeable, answered all my questions. And super nice to have such service from phone call to finished work.

reviews.Name: Rosie Penn
reviews.Description: True professionals, easy to make appointments and the technician arrived on time. He provided us with an estimate quickly and at a reasonable price. I would recommend them for all your plumbing needs.

reviews.Name: Amy Ford-Rios
reviews.Description:
I recommend the Plumbing Doc for your plumbing needs. Over the weekend I had an old toilet that started leaking on the floor. I called the Plumbing Doc and Jarred came out an hour later.
He was very honest with me that my toilet was very old and that he could get the new parts but it would be cheaper if I bought a new toilet.
He told me he would not charge me the service fee that night to come out but when I got my new toilet he would come back and install it for me.
He came back 2 days later and installed it. It   took him about 30mins and he took the old toilet and trash with him. He charged me the service
fee to come back out and install it.
The whole process was so easy and affordable.
Thank you!

reviews.Name: Nora Ortiz
reviews.Description: First time calling them for service. It was great they were able to come same day to check out our water heater. They seemed very knowledgeable about water heaters.

reviews.Name: Sherri j Welsh
reviews.Description: AJ and his partner were very professional and polite. Worked quickly and kept me informed. They will send me a video tomorrow of my pipes they sent a camera through. I do recommend The Plumbing Doctor for your needs.

reviews.Name: Tiffany
reviews.Description: I received great service. From the The Plumbing Doc. The gentlemen were very efficient and resolved my issues at an extremely reasonable rate. I am using them again tomorrow for more issues I am having and would highly recommend them to anyone needing any type of plumbing issues.

review_summary:
*   **Positive experiences:** Fast response times, same-day service, punctual appointments, knowledgeable technicians, detailed estimates, and efficient work.
*   **Excellent customer service:** Friendly, professional, empathetic, and communicative staff.
*   **Honesty and transparency:** Technicians offered cost-effective solutions, even suggesting cheaper alternatives.
*   **Reasonable pricing:** Customers found the service fees and overall costs to be affordable.
*   **Specific examples:** Resolved hot water issues, toilet repairs/installations, and general plumbing problems.
*   **Recommendations:** Highly recommended for various plumbing needs.

title: A1 Plumbing

reviews.Name: Bryana Woods
reviews.Description:
A1 plumbing has been a long time vendor with us here at Portfolio Property Management.
We can always count on Rick and his team to respond quickly and get the job done efficiently.
They provide great customer service and have quality work.
They even responded to after hour emergencies!!

Thank you Rick! I truly appreciate all you do for our company!

reviews.Name: Michelle Asher
reviews.Description:
I'm very impressed with Sean and Reese from A1 Plumbing!
After my dishwasher was repaired, my hot water would only "trickle" in my kitchen faucet, yet the dishwasher was filling up with hot water. By process of elimination and their knowledge, they were able to fix the problem and restore the hot water in my kitchen. I would definitely recommend A1 Plumbing to friends or family.

reviews.Name: JORGE CARLOS
reviews.Description:
A1 Plumbing was provided to me by my Home Warranty company .
I had a toilet leak and 2 people came, they checked under the house foe leakings but at the end it was just the wax seal of the toilet. First thing they ask is if they can use my bathroom to pee, like ok, I was ok with it.
The problem is that after they left I check and there was a mess in the bathroom,  also the hallway  and the trash can in the bathroom was full of their trash.
Also I checked outside and they didn't closed the cover to go under the house, they left a bucket outside and the disposable jumpsuit a guy was using was just left there on the patio. Very messy people.

reviews.Name: Walt
reviews.Description: Excellent Service 👍  A-1 Repiped my house making sure everything was securely mounted to the studs they had all the tools required to professionally repipe my house that's what I was most concerned about when having a big job performed on my property. I'm very happy with the price and serviced I received.

reviews.Name: Karina Lopez
reviews.Description: Worst customer service. I called to let the employer know that his employee cut me off and almost hit my car. He tried to justify what the driver did and undermined what I was telling him. He said “I’m pretty sure he didn’t mean to do it, these are brand new trucks”. That does not justify his employee’s reckless driving. He called me rude even though his employee almost hit my car with his company truck. Yet I’m the rude one even though anyone would be upset if their car almost got hit by a big company truck. I explained to him where we were at and yet all he said was “well I have 6 trucks and they’re new so I’m sure he didn’t mean to hit you”. Instead of taking liability of his employees action and extremely reckless driving with his big company truck. He was no help and just argued with me about my experience. I don’t want to scratch my car either yet I’m not cutting people off and driving recklessly. This is the type of customer service you will be looking forward to apparently if you have a grievance with this company. Very unprofessional and quite frankly very sexist with how he was talking to me and not taking me seriously.

reviews.Name: Popeye's World
reviews.Description:
The crew arrived and assessed the situation, and realized more needed to be done than a simple snaking. They had to replace a small section of underground line, and accomplished it in a relatively short time. Ran a line for the tub and everything is all good.

Outside clean up could have been a little better, but they got the job done.

reviews.Name: Kirbynorwalk American
reviews.Description: A1 Plumbing was provided to me by my Home Warranty company choice and they initially arrived. They stated the leak was from a leaking faucet and would have to get authorization from the Home Warranty company after receiving authorization stated that they would order the part. I confirm with them as I have text that the part would be equal and similar value, a few days later after multiple attempts to contact them and set up an appointment, I was unavailable to be there for the appointment and left my daughter to let them in when I was available after viewing the replacement item and previously confirming that it would be a vehicle or similar value. The item was not they stated that they were only authorized  to provide a builders quality and after confirming with choice, the authorization was for $70. My faucet was still under warranty, so I planned off setting the hundred dollars of which my home warranty company charged me for the repairs with returning the faucet and receiving my prorated amount, but to my  Dismay, the tech had taken the faucet after contacting A1 Plumbing . They said they would get the faucet back to me. Also provided in a text, but within minute stated that they no longer had the faucet and would be unable to provide. I stated that was unacceptable. They were never given permission to take from my home , and asked them to do the right thing and either returning the value of the faucet or the faucet itself I contacted my warranty company and told them I deemed this as theft. They were in agreement after hearing my side of the story and stated they would escalate this further informed A1 Plumbing  That they need to do what is right or I will pursue this in small claims court and file a complaint of theft with the police department at this time they have not chosen to do what is right so I have no choice but to pursue legal stay away from this company  You’ll be out more than a leaking faucet .

reviews.Name: Blaire Bennett
reviews.Description: I can't say enough great things about Rick and his crew. I moved to Bakersfield 5 years ago and they've been to my house several times now. Each and every time they have come out immediately and fixed the problem. They are so incredibly nice and reliable. 100% the only plumbers I'll recommend.

review_summary:
*   **Positive:**
    *   Reliable and responsive, with quick service.
    *   Provides great customer service and quality work.
    *   Available for after-hours emergencies.
    *   Knowledgeable and able to solve complex plumbing issues.
    *   Professional repiping service with proper mounting and tools.
    *   Friendly and reliable service.
*   **Negative:**
    *   Poor cleanup after some jobs, leaving a mess.
    *   Poor customer service from the owner, including justifying reckless driving and arguing with a customer.
    *   Potential for theft of parts and failure to return them.
    *   Unprofessional behavior and failure to resolve issues.
    *   Issues with warranty work, including providing substandard parts and taking the original faucet without permission.

title: Can Do Crew Plumbing Heating & AC

reviews.Name: Mary Guenette
reviews.Description: During his visit, Brian took detailed photos of our current unit and showed me how bad it was after having not been serviced and likely over five years. He was able to inform me that my unit was 21 years old and gave me wonderful payment options for a brand new unit. Unfortunately, at this time I’m not able to afford a brand new unit. Brian was able to find the motherboard that was needed for the current unit that I have and had it fixed by 12:30 on the same day. He went out of his way to help our small family and ensure that we’re able to keep our little daughter warm.

reviews.Name: Alex Zambrano
reviews.Description: All I can say is AMAZING job!  I feel like I got the white glove service with Jesse, Jason, and Jose Chavez!  Very professional, communicative, and joked around with me and made me feel like I was family!  They covered my floors so they didn’t scuff anything up, they covered my son’s entire closet so they did not get any of his shoes or clothes dirty!  They left my house cleaner than when they came lol!  These guys worked Non stop, and did not complain one time!  I loved the fact that it seemed like they met prior to my install, came up with a gameplan and executed flawlessly!  They even inspected each others work and gave insight on how to improve prior to completion!  Wow!!!  Just WOW!!!  Can Do Crew is actual the team that Can Do!!!!  Thank you so much!!!! The least I could Do was Buy them Lunch!

reviews.Name: John Harrer
reviews.Description:
We needed new drainage pipes for our women’s bathroom at the Fairfax Grange. The building is 80 years old and fragile. Marcos came out and assessed the problem and told us exactly what we needed and how much it would cost.

We’re scheduled a time, the work was done efficiently. I liked that Marcos and his helper Derek, answered all my questions. They also stayed until all the joints were dry and tested the entire system.

Phillip, the scheduler, texted me every time someone was on their way. The estimator was fantastic as well. He set the price and I thought it was very reasonable. If I have home plumbing issues, these are the guys I’m going to call.

reviews.Name: Michael McNeil
reviews.Description: Very impressed with Anthony and of can-do plumbing they showed up on time went straight to work. Did a very professional job. They were easy to talk to very knowledgeable cleaned up when they were done and I couldn’t be happier with the job. Would definitely give them a high recommendation.

reviews.Name: Louise Fisher
reviews.Description: We attempted to change the water shut off to our toilet ourselves. Unfortunately, we did more damage and had to keep our water shut off until the next morning. We were able to have a technician come out within 30 minutes of calling Can Do Crew. Derek was friendly, courteous and did a great job! Now we can enjoy our weekend. We will definitely call him again for any future plumbing issues.

reviews.Name: M.M. Silva
reviews.Description:
Josh returned today to complete a replacement that was needed and was as pleasant and efficient as the previous service call. I always like to learn about the systems in my house and Josh was more than happy to provide explanations and pictures of the unit. The heater is working wonderfully. Thank you for a job well done!

I called for help with my thermostat and an appointment was set up for the next day, which was awesome. The service technician that was sent out did an outstanding job. Josh was professional, very knowledgeable, thorough and very pleasant. I will be calling the Can Do Crew again for future help with my air and/or plumbing issues!

reviews.Name: garrett penwell
reviews.Description: Joshua from the Can Do Crew was amazing! He was able to remove and replace my ancient and broken AC in just a few hours! And all for an incredible price, too. I’ll definitely be calling them for all of my plumbing and AC needs!

reviews.Name: Hilary Tyler
reviews.Description: Alex and Derek were the best plumbers we’ve ever had. They did an excellent job replacing several hose bibs, a water pipe in the wall, and a water pressure regulator AND they cleaned up after themselves!   They were very respectful of our home and just really nice guys. We will always use Can Do.

owner.name: Can Do Crew Plumbing Heating & AC (Owner)

review_summary:
*   **Positive experiences:** Customers consistently praise the professionalism, communication, and cleanliness of the technicians.
*   **Specific praise:** Technicians are described as knowledgeable, efficient, and helpful, often going above and beyond.
*   **Services:** Positive feedback on various services, including repairs, replacements (AC, heater, pipes), and installations.
*   **Responsiveness:**  Quick response times and scheduling are highlighted.
*   **Teamwork:**  Appreciation for the team's coordination and thoroughness.
*   **Overall Satisfaction:** Customers express high satisfaction and a willingness to use the company again.

title: J Plumbing -20 Years Experience

reviews.Name: Jesse Meza
reviews.Description: Called J plumbing to do a job for me to snake out a clean out drain. He got it done pretty fast and pretty reasonable price. I would recommend him to anybody.

reviews.Name: Rudy Urbina
reviews.Description: He does amazing work! When we had a leak from the main to the house, he had it dug up and repaired in a day... And for a great price! Also fixed our shower and toilet. If you need some good honest work, hit him up. Definitely recommend him.

reviews.Name: Mark Russell
reviews.Description: Great Guy. Quick / prompt/ professional. I had blockage in my home plumping. I used his service more than once. Repeat business for sure. Highly recommended!!

reviews.Name: Eddie Herbert
reviews.Description: I called J. Plumbing and he was there the next day to deal with my problem. He is knowledgeable, takes care of business in a timely manner and is a pleasure to talk to.

reviews.Name: jose sanchez
reviews.Description: Charges a estimate fee because his prices are super high and knows the customer won't agree to price. DONT RECOMMENDED 👎🏽

reviews.Name: AJ Trujillo
reviews.Description: Responded to my request for service quickly.  Came out next morning and resolved issues   Friendly, explains each step as he goes.    Will definitely use in the future

reviews.Name: Mary Taylor (Tay)
reviews.Description: Joe did a great job installing the line needed for my refrigerator’s ice and water. It was a complicated job bc he had to run the line all the way across my kitchen. Professionally installed, cleaned up everything and super friendly. Thanks Joe!

reviews.Name: A J
reviews.Description: I highly recommend! Called on a Sunday afternoon frantic and he was here in less than an hour. The pricing was so reasonable and 3 hours later we have everything fixed. I am so appreciative and will definitely call them for future needs.

review_summary:
*   **Positive:** Fast, efficient, and reasonably priced service. Highly recommended for various plumbing issues including drain cleaning, leak repairs, shower/toilet fixes, and appliance installations. Provides quick response times, professional work, and clear explanations.
*   **Negative:** One review claims high prices and an estimate fee.

title: HPS Plumbing Services

reviews.Name: S. Martin
reviews.Description:
I recently had an excellent experience with HPS Mechanical for an AC repair, and I wanted to take a moment to commend their service technicians, Julian and Vincent. From the start, they were professional, friendly, and very knowledgeable.

Julian and Vincent arrived on time and took their time to assess the issue with my air conditioning unit. They explained what was wrong in a way that was easy to understand and provided me with clear options for repair. I appreciated their transparency and willingness to answer all my questions.

The repair process was efficient, and they worked diligently to ensure everything was fixed properly. Not only did they restore my AC to perfect working condition, but they also took the time to clean up after the job was done, which I really appreciated.

I highly recommend HPS Mechanical and specifically thank Julian and Vincent for their outstanding service. It’s rare to find such dedicated professionals, and I will definitely call them for any future HVAC needs!

reviews.Name: Krysta Kendrick
reviews.Description:
First, I would like to say that the lady that I had spoke with the boss, she was very kind and understanding, and I truly appreciate her, but as far as the employees that I witnessed today, making fun of somebody and belittling them and pointing and laughing because they’re out here getting recyclables for their family Shame on you. I’m gonna pray for you. You never know what someone’s going through at the end of the day hustle is a hustle. We’re just out here trying to feed our family and instead we’re getting laughed at and mocked at  while people are on the job at the end of the day your job isn’t any better than mine you do plumbing with all due respect so your job is essentially the same as our hustle right now . I really pray that you men that I saw laughing and mocking my husband do not do this again to someone else . We live in a cruel world it takes not even one second to be kind.
Make sure that nobody pays back wrong for wrong, but always strive to do what is good for each other and for everyone else.
1 Thessalonians 5:15 NIV

reviews.Name: Mahlon Davis
reviews.Description: Can not say enough good things about our experience with Chris. Entire system was clogged (no shower no potty) and with a 2 year being sick and the only that makes her fell better is a bath at the moment we needed help. HPS came out the next day and was done with in an hour! And a side note we were ready to pay what ever it cost to get our plumbing going again as soon as possible and HPS was the first to get out here and were half the cost of other local plumbers.

reviews.Name: Mario Rojas
reviews.Description: Loved the job!! HPS installed a new gas line for my pool heater. Edgar and Frankie were very knowledge and professional. Edgar took the time to explain the process. I will use them again for my plumbing needs

reviews.Name: Amanda Wade
reviews.Description:
Johel was our HPS plumber, he was excellent! He diagnosed the problem with leak behind our refrigerator and ordered the part that was needed. Came back promptly the next day when the part was here and fixed the leak quickly within an 1 1/2hrs. He was very kind and professional!
Thanks Johel!
Joey and Amanda Cabrera

reviews.Name: Sarah Lewis
reviews.Description:
My water heater died on a holiday weekend. Call their dispatch. They were clear with the price for coming out. When Eddie the service provider showed up, he was kind courteous and honest with me about the cost of replacing on a holiday. Eddie came back the very next day and took care of my water heater. Professional 100% of the time. An extra part was needed and it was bright to my house quickly!

Thanks HPS for saving me!!

reviews.Name: Lilia “Diamond Lil”
reviews.Description: I called concerned about my water heater. Eddie came out inspected what I have and explained the situation very thoroughly. He also gave me a quote if I want to replace an upgrade my current water heater. Since he was here for HPS, I showed him the backwash that was corroded. He will be replacing that for me next month. Great attitude and very friendly and explained everything so that me as a female can understand! I highly recommend using this company. When I called for the appointment on Friday they gave me a Monday appointment.

reviews.Name: mattu
reviews.Description: Julian did a great job fixing our AC. Would definitely recommend HPS !

review_summary:
*   **Positive Experiences:** Customers praise the professionalism, knowledge, efficiency, and cleanliness of technicians (Julian, Vincent, Chris, Edgar, Frankie, Johel, and Eddie). Specific jobs mentioned include AC repair, clogged system repair, gas line installation, leak repair, and water heater replacement/inspection.
*   **Positive Attributes:** Technicians are described as friendly, kind, courteous, honest, and communicative, explaining issues and options clearly.
*   **Value:** HPS Plumbing Services is noted for being prompt and offering competitive pricing.
*   **Negative Experience:** One review mentions a negative experience with employees mocking an individual collecting recyclables, highlighting a lack of kindness and professionalism.

title: Frye Plumbing Inc

reviews.Name: Carmen A.
reviews.Description: Eugene is timely, responsive, professional and reasonably priced. I can highly recommend him whatever your plumbing issue may be.

review_summary: Eugene is highly recommended for being timely, responsive, professional, and reasonably priced.

title: Ron's Speedy Rooter & Plumbing Repair, Inc

reviews.Name: Charles Homer
reviews.Description: Ron was great. Called last night around 7pm to make an appointment to unclog my kitchen sink and he came the next morning. Ron was nice, professional, and very knowledgeable of the issue. He look care of my sink fast and was very affordable. I recommend everyone use him for any plumbing issues.

reviews.Name: Kris Simpson
reviews.Description: Thank You Ron's Plumbing. We had a leak in our pharmacy this morning and 2 technicians were on site within a hour. Explained in detail and showed us the problem. Courteous and knowledgeable. Replaced pipe and cleaned up the minimal water left on the floor. We have been using them for years. Very dependable.

reviews.Name: Andy Stanley
reviews.Description:
Our kitchen sink was clogged and leaking. The service technician snakes the line and was able to get the sink to drain. We have barely used the sink and two days later it is clogged and leaking again. I called and a second technician came very quickly.

On the second service call the technician pulled out items in the line that clearly were causing the leak.  I was not charged for the call and I very much appreciate them making this right.  Thank you very much!

reviews.Name: Jenny Freeman
reviews.Description: Ron's Speedy Roter lives up to their name! They are the only plumber we call. They have always come out within 24 hours and do a great job. They've fixed our problem the same day. Highly recommend.

reviews.Name: MJ Chavez
reviews.Description:
It was New Years Eve and my house was packed with family - no other plumber I called would answer, except for Ron's! Even though his guys were already busy, when I told Ron about what happened at my house (nasty toilet backup with a packed house) he came by himself and fixed it for me.

I was thinking we would be stuck with that clog until the morning - so thankful I found Ron. Real stand up guy, won't be calling anyone else! Thank you!

reviews.Name: Yoffer
reviews.Description: This company was very proactive when it comes to figuring out a solution to a plumbing problem that a couple other companies could not help with, well the other guys tried although the leak was still coming through again next day. Then Jer showed up and somehow knew shortly after what the problem was! Price was not dirt cheap like the other companies although it was fair to get it done right would have rather called them from the beginning. thanks Jer!

reviews.Name: Hector Zaragoza
reviews.Description: Friendly, straight forward,  honest, and knows his job very well. Explained all work so that I can understand it. Would definitely recommend him and Ron's Plumbing to people I know.

reviews.Name: Valente Del Villar
reviews.Description: Quick fast, cheap arrived within the hour extremely friendly. Great customer service from when I called the secretary very friendly and also her associate Jeremiah thank you so much Ron’s Speedy Rooter & Plumbing 🙂

owner.name: Ron's Speedy Rooter & Plumbing Repair, Inc (Owner)

review_summary:
*   **Positive:** Ron's Speedy Rooter is praised for being fast, reliable, professional, knowledgeable, and affordable. They offer same-day service and are responsive in emergencies. Technicians are courteous, explain issues clearly, and fix problems effectively.
*   **Specific Issues Addressed:** Clogged sinks, leaks, toilet backups.
*   **Customer Service:** Excellent customer service is highlighted, including friendly staff and proactive problem-solving.
*   **Recommendations:** Highly recommended by multiple customers.

title: Advanced Plumbing Service
address: 3748 Renfro Rd Ste. A, Bakersfield, CA 93314

reviews.Name: Stephen Maestas
reviews.Description: My interaction with Advanced Plumbing was great! I needed the original shut off valves for my washer replaced since they froze up and were leaking. I had to shut off my water to the house to stop the leak, which was inconvenient to say the least. I had another plumbing company come out prior but they did not have the parts and had to order them which caused me to continue to be without water in my home. Their technician Christian was very professional and expedient in his work. Advanced plumbing carries 95% of the parts needed on their trucks which enabled them to get the job done right away. I would definitely recommend and use them again in the future.

reviews.Name: Gloria Lopez
reviews.Description: Great service and decent price. Estimate amount which was only $65,  went towards repair instead of separately like other companies. As we all know, plumbing issues are a nightmare. I sat on fixing my shower water pressure until it completely gave out. Plumber was out on time, very knowledgeable and respectful. Explained the problem and repaired it all within an hour and a half. Will never bother with any other company again.

reviews.Name: jimstamour
reviews.Description: We had a clogged kitchen drain. Tony, from Advanced Plumbing, was great. He solved our clogged drain problem quickly and fully. We have had 3 or 4 unrelated plumbing problems over the last few years. We called Advanced Plumbing each time and have always been very satisfied. We will continue to call on them in the future.

reviews.Name: Jennifer C
reviews.Description: Our water heater was leaking a lot of water and Advanced Plumbing was able to come to us quickly. Our plumber was Daniel and he was very professional and courteous. Highly recommend!

reviews.Name: CB Byer (CB)
reviews.Description:
I cannot express enough how please I am with the overall experience I received. I was able to have the issue addresses very quickly and the professionalism of the office staff was outstanding.

The technician that came out was (Chris) was incredible. He was knowledgeable, professional and on top of it. He explained the condition of the water heater and validated it was 20 years old. He provided me options and I ultimately went with replacing the water heater.

The water heater was replaced quickly and a much cleaner look compared to what we had.

Hands down I recommend them as a plumbing service. I have them down as my permanent service provider.

reviews.Name: Randy Jackson
reviews.Description: Called them up and had a tech the following morning. Tony got my valves replaced in a hurry. Craftsmanship and good quality work. Thanks again

reviews.Name: Celia Pinal
reviews.Description: Excellent service!  They arrived as scheduled and their technician, Christopher is very knowledgeable and honest when diagnosing the issue with our water heater.  Excellent customer service.  Give Advanced Plumbing a call when experiencing issues with your water heater.

reviews.Name: Missy Lonsinger
reviews.Description: I had an issue with one of my toilets, and they had someone out within half an hour to fix it! He was super effect and fast at replacing and fixing the broken parts, and all for a reasonable cost! I highly recommend!

review_summary:
Advanced Plumbing Service receives positive reviews for:

*   **Prompt and efficient service:** Technicians arrive quickly and complete work efficiently.
*   **Professionalism and knowledge:** Technicians are knowledgeable, respectful, and explain issues clearly.
*   **Availability of parts:** They carry a wide range of parts, allowing for immediate repairs.
*   **Good value:** Prices are considered decent, with estimates often applied to the final cost.
*   **Variety of services:** They handle various plumbing issues, including valve replacements, clogged drains, water heater repairs/replacements, and toilet repairs.
*   **Excellent Customer Service:** The office staff and technicians are praised for their customer service.
*   **Reliability:** Customers repeatedly use and recommend the service.

title: The Plumbing Doc

reviews.Name: Lindale Duley
reviews.Description:
We had to re-pipe our home, first of all the cuts they made inside of my homes sheet rock was cut out so perfectly that it was easy to put back when they were done doing the piping, they cleaned their work area perfectly when they were done with different areas. They were on time for each visit and I appreciate the text saying when they were on their way.  they knew what they were doing and professional . I had total confidence in their jobs.
Before they were done, we asked for some business Because I would 100% recommend them for any job

reviews.Name: kelly tackett
reviews.Description: I have used this plumbing company for business and for personal.  They are very professional, fast and knowledgeable about what they do.  They are very friendly and explain what they had to do or what needs to be done.  I would highly recommend this company.

reviews.Name: Jayme Gooding
reviews.Description: The Plumbing Doc has handled jobs at different properties for us for years now. They are responsive, professional, and communicative. I highly recommend them!

reviews.Name: Belinda arrieta
reviews.Description: The plumbing dock was amazing we called him at the last minute on a busy Sunday super bowl Sunday at that they have excellent customer service they arrived to our residence as soon as possible and took care of our issues highly recommend this company

reviews.Name: Maria Negrete
reviews.Description: Finding out we had a broken sewer line on the street was beyond stressful but plumbing doc was AMAZING!!!! They understood the stress we were under, they were so honest and helpful! I asked a million questions and called a million times and they never got annoyed or frustrated with me. Thank you so much to the entire crew for everything!

reviews.Name: David Ruff
reviews.Description: Excellent experience and a job well done. A.J. along with Chris did work on the outside water pipes that leaked and took longer than expected and still charged 100 bucks less than a competitor. The inside work was done in a fast and efficient manner. From estimate to repair was finished in 2 days. I would highly recommend this establishment for all plumbing needs. Five star service and courteous as well. Thanks Plumbing Doc-another 5 star review!!

reviews.Name: Patti Waye
reviews.Description: I can honestly say that I have been using Plumbing Doc on the property that I manage and am very happy with them. Always very professional, polite and gets the job done in a very timely manner. They are very prompt to getting an appointment for you.. Most times within a couple of hours after receiving a call.  Thank you. Patti;  Community Manager Lotus Villas Apartments.

reviews.Name: Jannette Standridge
reviews.Description: Toilets and showers backed up. Made an after hours call. They came out within 2 hours because they were on a job when I called. Had it all fixed and cleared up in no time. They were great! Prices were reasonable. Will be using this company in the future.

review_summary: The Plumbing Doc receives consistently positive reviews, highlighting their professionalism, knowledge, responsiveness, and excellent customer service. Customers praise their punctuality, cleanliness, and clear communication. They are recommended for both residential and commercial plumbing needs, handling jobs efficiently and offering reasonable pricing. Reviewers specifically mention their ability to handle emergencies and stressful situations with honesty and helpfulness.

title: Brad's Plumbing

reviews.Name: Mina cookie
reviews.Description: I am beyond glad I call Brad's Plumbing. After 10 days with no hot water. I called him and withing 30 mins he was at my house. 2 hrs later HOT WATER!!! Super friendly and he didn't charged an arm and a leg like other plumbing company's would. From now on we will call him for any plumbing problems. Totally recommend by yours truly. 🤩

reviews.Name: Alishia Youngblood
reviews.Description: Brad is top notch service!!! My first time having Brad at my house was the evening of the day before Thanksgiving. I thought for sure I was going to pay out the nose but, he was cheaper then anyone I had called to fix the problem. He was extremely quick in arriving to my home after I called him and left a message. Professional, experience and skills had the problem fixed in less then 15 minutes (Which I had been struggling with the clog all day without any results!). I will call Brad again! He is the best in town by far!

reviews.Name: willk marilao
reviews.Description: I researched the problem and solution before calling Brad. When Brad arrived, he properly diagnosed the problem, had the new and improved parts on hand, and repaired my elderly mother's pipe and cut off valve under her bathroom sink, which was spraying water all over the place! I have three words to describe Brad. HONEST, HONEST, and HONEST!

reviews.Name: Rhonda Martin
reviews.Description: They came out very Fast, Fixed the problem in a short time. Very Kind and Coutious!! Very Fair Price. I Highly Recommend💯

reviews.Name: Monica R (Mami)
reviews.Description: Friendly and funny! Quickly uncloged out system and got it up and running.

reviews.Name: Doug Lancaster
reviews.Description: Good price and a very quick response

reviews.Name: Roy Bunch
reviews.Description: They were on time and very curtios

review_summary:
*   **Fast and responsive service:** Arrives quickly (within 30 minutes) and fixes problems promptly.
*   **Affordable/Fair Pricing:**  Charges reasonable prices, cheaper than competitors.
*   **Professional and Skilled:** Experienced and efficient in diagnosing and resolving plumbing issues.
*   **Positive Customer Experience:** Friendly, kind, courteous, and honest.
*   **Highly Recommended:** Customers are very satisfied and plan to use Brad's Plumbing again.

title: America's Best Plumbing

reviews.Name: Jay Guzman
reviews.Description:
For those who would like to know about my experience working with Americans Best Plumbing in 01/2025. I was so thrilled they were responsive 24/7, I had reached out to them on a weekend during the night, with my own plunging emergency. They showed up quickly and the young man was great, he listened closely to my situation he was friendly, positive and very reassuring about the work solution ahead. Thankfully he has everything he needed in his nice looking, well stocked company van.
I was impressed how he made sure to keep the work area clean as he progressed on my repairs. He vacuumed up water from the damage area and ran a fan to help dry the water on the floor.
In the end the work was completed and everything was working perfectly. The experience working with America’s Best Plumbing was better than I could have imagined. I would recommend them to anyone and I plan call them in the future again.

reviews.Name: Maggie Paulsen
reviews.Description: Great experience with Americas Best! Jacob was super nice, professional, and got the job done fast. He took the time to explain everything beforehand and was transparent about the pricing—no surprise charges! Always happy to support local family-owned businesses. 😁 Highly recommend!!

reviews.Name: John DeArkland
reviews.Description: America's best plumbing did a great job on my toilet repair. They arrived at my house within an hour of my call. Hector was very professional and had my toilet repaired quick. I would definitely recommend their services if you are in need of plumbing repairs.

reviews.Name: Erick Martinez
reviews.Description: Called AMERICAS BEST late last night around 11:30pm after some gaming with the buds. I heard water running from my bedrooms restroom went to google and found these guys. Can’t remember who answered the phone I believe it was the boss but he walked me through how to shut off the water knew exactly where everything in my mobile home complex was. “This was new to me as I just moved in” Jacob stopped by 9:30 this morning found the problem, had great communication and was able to explain and show me the problem, on top of the leak he installed a new water heater and removed the old for us! PRICING is super affordable for the amount of work done! Would call again 100% THANK YOU JACOB AND THANK YOU AMERICAS BEST!

reviews.Name: James Johnson
reviews.Description:
America's Best Plumbing Company in Bakersfield, I will say "IS  THE BEST."  I had hired another plumbing company-horrible experience.
Then America's Best Plumbing arrived to the rescue and guaranteed their work. SUPER NICE AND INFORMATIVE STAFF, TOO!!! The entire 4" line was damaged,  they dug it out and replaced in a matter of a few hours... so pleased!!! Thank you so much, Russ and Lazaro.😊👍

reviews.Name: Aimee Bigby jones
reviews.Description:
I can’t express my appreciation enough to Russ and Ernesto! I needed my master bathroom toilet fixed and they were extremely prompt, efficient, and communicative from start to finish. I texted Russ about my issue and he promptly responded by calling me that afternoon. The very next day, my toilet was repaired! Not to mention, Ernesto who was a pleasure to work with, he left my bathroom in better shape than it was originally. I’m very grateful for Russ and Ernesto for the exceptional service so I thought I needed to express my appreciation and gratitude.

Thank you again,
Aimee

reviews.Name: Julie Young
reviews.Description: America’s Best Plumbing was excellent! We had a clogged sink drain in a bathroom causing all kinds of problems, and they came quickly. While they were here, they also helped me with a small problem with my washing machine water hook up and totally fixed everything. They were on time, professional, and affordable. I definitely recommend America’s Best Plumbing!

reviews.Name: Frank Smith
reviews.Description:
Excellent work at a fair price.
Service call with mainline drain cleaning  and clog removal from the roof , was only $125. They showed up 30 minutes after I called . Licensed and professional. CALL THESE PEOPLE FIRST . I know will.
Thank you !

review_summary:
America's Best Plumbing receives consistently positive reviews. Key highlights include:

*   **Responsive and Available:** 24/7 availability and quick response times, including nights and weekends.
*   **Professional and Friendly Technicians:** Technicians are described as friendly, communicative, and professional. Many reviewers mention specific technicians by name, praising their helpfulness and expertise.
*   **Efficient and Effective Service:** Jobs are completed quickly and effectively, with repairs done right the first time.
*   **Cleanliness:** Technicians maintain a clean work area.
*   **Transparent Pricing:** Upfront and fair pricing with no surprise charges.
*   **Wide Range of Services:** Handles various plumbing issues, from toilet repairs and drain cleaning to water heater installation and mainline replacement.
*   **Highly Recommended:** Customers express high satisfaction and willingness to recommend and reuse the service.

title: Amen Plumbing and Drain Service

reviews.Name: Joe Chan
reviews.Description: I'm extremely happy my friend recommended this company. The owner Scott is extremely honest (I do know a little bit about plumbing), responsive, and does high quality work. He's also nice and explains what he did in a manner easy to understand. I needed an outside faucet and the water main valve to my house replaced. Scott showed up when he said he would, and had the job done very quickly. His prices are very good as well. Amen Plumbing will be my plumber going forward.

reviews.Name: Goldie Gill
reviews.Description:
Scott was pleasant and professional. He fixed a issue with my faucets that 2 other plumbers couldn’t or wouldn’t deal with, I urge anyone who’s thinking about starting a project/repair to start with him let him be your first option, I am very satisfied by the quality of work and for a great reasonable value. (Cheaper than what I paid with the last 2 guys). He’s great–friendly, professional, and explains things well AND he cleaned up the mess the leak had left on the tile floor. I definitely will be using Amen plumbing agian.
Thanks Scott,
Gill

reviews.Name: Suzanne Cornell
reviews.Description: December 2019,  I could replace my kitchen faucet but could not get a very old part to come out so I called Amen Plumbing. Adam replaced that faucet, a bathroom faucet and a shower faucet that had been leaking. He was on time,. He quickly and efficiently fixed everything. He left the areas clean, and his fee was reasonable. I will refer him to anyone who needs plumbing help.

reviews.Name: Drew Barton
reviews.Description:
Came over and told me he was in a hurry to get to his next job he had planned, less that 30 minutes after he showed up to my house. Pushed his plumbing auger into my septic line very quickly and didn't unclog the leak. He told me it was a septic issue and referred me to Knight's to pump the septic tank. After having the septic tank pumped, the line was still clogged.
My problem was solved by calling an experienced plumber at Roto-Rooter, and he used his auger to slowly get the line unclogged. Don't waste your money on someone who walks away from a problem they can't fix.

reviews.Name: Sarah Osorio
reviews.Description: We have used him twice now. One small job and to replace our water heater. He was punctual, efficient, and affordable. We are extremely satisfied with our new water heater. He was extremely professional.

reviews.Name: Jacob Smoot
reviews.Description: I had several bids on a re-pipe on my house everyone I called gave me a ridiculous amount. Amen bid at an affordable price and did the job in half the time the others said they could do it. Clean, professional and friendly. God bless you sir.

reviews.Name: patman83
reviews.Description: Awesome work. Reasonable prices. Honest. What more can you ask for?

reviews.Name: Lewis Tudor
reviews.Description: Excellent service, knowledgeable and timely.

review_summary:
*   **Positive:** Honest, responsive, high-quality work, explains work clearly, punctual, efficient, affordable, professional, and cleans up. Solved issues other plumbers couldn't. Replaced faucets and water heater successfully. Completed a re-pipe at an affordable price and in less time than competitors.
*   **Negative:** One negative review mentions a rushed job that didn't fix the problem and a referral to another company that was unnecessary.

title: Slater Plumbing & Mechanical

reviews.Name: Brown Skin Beauty
reviews.Description: We live in an apartment and the guest bathroom flooded Sunday night unexpectedly. I called my complex to put in a maintenance request and they came to fix it. However they used my personal bathing towels to clean up the mess and left just about every light on in my place. Well fast forward to Tuesday night and I notice the flooding again. Mind you it's is the day before a holiday. So I think to myself I'm screwed until Thursday. I call my complex again and reach the emergency line. At this time it's about 5 am on a holiday. My apartment manager calls and informs me someone from this company is coming out and would be there shortly. Well, by the time they came I had fell back asleep and when I realized he was knocking on my door and woke up, he was gone. I call the company and let them know my situation and she infomed me the tech will be calling me. He arrived about 20 minutes later, did his thing and fixed my issue. Carlos even straightened up after himself which I really appreciated because I'm scheduled for a surgery soon and cannot due much of anything right now. I would highly recommend them for their professionalism and courtesy despite the holiday season.

reviews.Name: Melissa Shaver
reviews.Description: Great service! With short notice, Slaters arrived in a timely manner to assess a leak underneath my house. Very communicative from start to finish. Austin was very professional and friendly!  Would highly recommend! Thank you!

reviews.Name: Dan Braum
reviews.Description: Asked them for a quote, they were unable to provide one. Next thing I know they send us a bill for $300 in my employee's name. Refuse to even discuss anything and send it to collection. I would not recommend doing business with them

reviews.Name: toujours à la recherche de qui je suis
reviews.Description: I called Slater Plumbing, they were very professional and quickly took care of my problem. These are my go-to guys! Thank you so very much, Slater Plumbing.

reviews.Name: Gordon Team Realty
reviews.Description: This is an amazing company. It's family owned, reliable, and experienced. We highly recommend them!

reviews.Name: Chad Hathaway
reviews.Description: Great guys that do a great job. Would recommend Slater Plumbing anyone.

reviews.Name: Willie Gordon
reviews.Description: Slater Plumbing has always been there for us and we appreciate their hard work and dedication to the Bakersfield community!

reviews.Name: Grandpa Joe Jeep Cherokee Unicorn
reviews.Description: They do amazing work. They are quick to respond, extremely, professional and great company to work with.

review_summary:
*   **Positive:**
    *   Responsive and timely service, even on holidays.
    *   Professional and courteous technicians (Carlos, Austin).
    *   Cleaned up after themselves.
    *   Recommended for their professionalism and courtesy.
    *   Reliable and experienced.
    *   Family-owned.
    *   Great work and quick response times.
    *   Dedicated to the Bakersfield community.
*   **Negative:**
    *   Unable to provide a quote.
    *   Sent an unauthorized bill and refused to discuss it, leading to collections.

title: Stan's Discount Rooter & Plumbing

reviews.Name: Jennifer Mueller
reviews.Description: Most reasonably priced of the 4 businesses I contacted for main sewer line clean out. They came the same day and knocked the problem out in less than an hour. The woman who answered the phone was pleasant & helpful. The man who came to service my property was professional & efficient. I highly recommend them if you have plumbing issues.

reviews.Name: Danielle Marks
reviews.Description: Horrible and disrespectful employee Matt truck #18 instead of parking by the area he was working at was parked in front of my place. I asked him nicely to move and instead was rude. I called the office and the receptionist was just as rude. When I asked to speak to her boss or owner she lied saying she was the boss and hung up on me. I called back to ask her name and who owned the company because I did not believe an owner of the company whose other employees besides Matt or her have been very professional. Her smart mouth says Stanley plumbing hello. I said well you said your the owner so this is the professionalism of the wife?  She hung up on me after saying I can walk. Absolutely disgusted and disappointed with this company. My place and the one he is working at with door open has not one vehicle parked on that side. I came home from urgent care and this is what I had to deal with. Thanks for kindness Matt truck #18 as you said sitting in your van and the sweet receptionist that co-signed your rudness. This company sure has changed.

reviews.Name: Patty Smith
reviews.Description: Stan’s Discount Rooter and Plumbing are awesome! They do amazing work and are honest and trustworthy. Curtis is very knowledgeable and the owner Harry cares about his customers over profit. I will always use Stan’s and you should too!

reviews.Name: Jeannette Eversen
reviews.Description: Fantastic customer service! The tech had the toilet valve unit replaced in under 5 minutes, and for a very reasonable price. Have been using them for my plumbing needs since 2003, and they never cease to amaze me with their expertise and price.

reviews.Name: Cindy Hufnagel
reviews.Description: We had Christian come out and we had a very bad rusted flange and needed it replaced. He replaced everything and now we have our toilet working again. Thank-you very grateful for all your work. Cindy Hufnagel

reviews.Name: David Herrold
reviews.Description: I had a kitchen sink plugged up. Called Stan's, and they were able to come out and take care of it. Curtis was cool. got right to the job and was done fast. Will definitely use Stan's again.

reviews.Name: Isadore Lee
reviews.Description: They came out did nothing besides look at it and took off I have dogs yes it's gonna smell like shit but I clean that up and I miss a day of work they just hire anyone that lazy.

reviews.Name: Jane Decker
reviews.Description: Wonderful plumbers.  Always there when I need them.  Were able to find problems others couldn't

review_summary:
