*   **Positive:** Fast, efficient service; reasonable prices; helpful staff; knowledgeable and trustworthy technicians (Curtis, Christian); good for various plumbing issues (main sewer line cleanout, toilet repair, sink unclogging).
*   **Negative:** Rude employee (Matt) and receptionist; potential for poor service and laziness.
*   **Overall:** Mixed reviews; some customers have had excellent experiences, while others have encountered unprofessional behavior.

title: Bakersfield Roto-Rooter Plumbing & Water Cleanup

reviews.Name: Dennis Lileikis
reviews.Description: Roto-Rooter and especially Luke were awesome! Came on a late Saturday afternoon within 45min of calling. Got my clogged kitchen sink running free very speedily. Luke was amazing: knowledgeable, explained everything, super polite and very efficient!  I will definitely use again for plumbing needs.

reviews.Name: Lou Sangis
reviews.Description: Billy was knowledgeable and efficient.  He looked at the problem, bad toilet flange, and he replaced it quickly.  I recommend him highly.  You may see other Roto Rooter reviews because it's been a bad plumbing repair year.  All the techs that came to to various jobs have all been outstanding!  Thank you!

reviews.Name: S. Brothers
reviews.Description: Luis was very personable and satisfactorily answered my numerous questions.   He carefully diagramed my 🏠 & took copious notes about my needs, desires, as well as my expectations.  I very much appreciated his attention to details.

reviews.Name: Isaac Guerrero
reviews.Description:
I had a really great experience with Luis! He was extremely patient, knowledgeable, and overall a very kind person. If possible, for future repairs, I'd love to work with him again!

Great experience.10/10!

reviews.Name: Sue Gosland
reviews.Description: Faced with very old pipes, we were fortunate to find Roto Rooter plumbing.  They did a great job, talked us through the entire process, including time and cost.  We now have new sewer pipes connected to the city system correctly.  Thank you Ben, Salvatore, and all your helpers and concrete people.

reviews.Name: Daniela Guerrero
reviews.Description: They were very polite and professional and definitely educated me on the issue I had at my house. Prices were reasonable and all around great service. Good humor as well!

reviews.Name: Kim Hays
reviews.Description: Had to replace a main sewer line which was made more difficult due to an old water line too close to sewer line. Also had to remove part of a concrete patio.  They did everything with great care & even had a backup plan in case waterline broke. All went smoothly & they even patched the concrete & removed something for me that was in their way. Very professional & very well done! This involved dealing with 3 backyards of a triplex!

reviews.Name: Denise Sanchez
reviews.Description:
Not all heroes wear capes—some carry wrenches and save you from a plumbing crisis. Salvador came to my rescue when my sink decided to go on strike. Not only did he provide a clear and thoughtful explanation to my problem but he also truly cared about getting the job done right.

He went above and beyond to ensure everything was fixed perfectly, saving me from the heartbreak of a non-functional sink and the potential drain on my wallet (pun intended). His attention to detail and dedication were nothing short of legendary.

Roto-Rooter is quite expensive compared to other companies, but it was great to know I would be receiving top quality service. Five stars isn’t enough for this guy—I’d give him an entire galaxy if I could. Thank you, Salvador, for being awesome!

review_summary: Bakersfield Roto-Rooter Plumbing & Water Cleanup receives consistently positive reviews. Customers praise the technicians' knowledge, efficiency, politeness, and professionalism. Specific technicians mentioned include Luke, Billy, Luis, Ben, and Salvador, all receiving high praise. Services highlighted include unclogging sinks, replacing toilet flanges, pipe replacements, and main sewer line repairs. Customers appreciated clear explanations, attention to detail, and reasonable pricing. While some note the higher cost compared to other companies, the quality of service is consistently lauded.

title: Tommy's Plumbing Service

reviews.Name: Daniel Torres
reviews.Description: I recommend Tommy's Plumbing, great work, prompt service, friendly, and the what I think is one of  the most important things,honesty. If you want to keep getting ripped off, keep going with the other companies. The other company wanted to charge me 675.00 dollars for a job, you can guess who I went with,Tommy's of course.

reviews.Name: Daniel Cerda
reviews.Description: Free estimates and professional advice for any of your Plumbing needs. Definitely would recommend simply on their Honesty.

reviews.Name: Alex Carver
reviews.Description: Quick response and excellent work for a fair price.  Great find.

reviews.Name: Irene Navarrette
reviews.Description: Great honest service

reviews.Name: Ruby Torres
reviews.Description: Good prices

reviews.Name: Mark Roblez
reviews.Description: Excellent service !!!

review_summary:
*   **Positive:** Honest, prompt, friendly, and provides excellent service.
*   **Value:** Offers fair prices and free estimates.
*   **Recommendation:** Highly recommended for plumbing needs, especially due to honesty.

title: Gundlach's Service

reviews.Name: Jean Nilssen
reviews.Description: My technician Alexander Elkins arrived on time and was very careful and thorough all in his work and explanations. He went out of his way to make sure I understood everything he was doing and why. He has been here before and I have found him going above  and beyond what is expected of him. His courtesy and professionalism are A1. I would definitely give him the highest recommendation, and I know he must be a great value to your company.

reviews.Name: Wendi Hasha
reviews.Description: Having a membership with Gundlachs gives me such peace of mind. Michael K was at my house within an hour, on a Sunday,  and quickly fixed my hot water tank. I cannot say thank you enough!

reviews.Name: B Helton
reviews.Description: This is by far the best company in Bakersfield.  I had a plumbing emergency at midnight and Anthony was at my home by 2:00 AM.  Andrew keeps my A/C and heater in top condition.  Join the Care Club and have 100 percent confidence that you will be taken care of.

reviews.Name: Jared L
reviews.Description:
We called out Gundlach’s before the July 4th holiday to look at our AC unit. Outside of the commutation issues we had with this company their technician would open the door without knocking or ringing the door bell; he never asked if it was okay if he came in and out of the house. The technician for some reason had to use our water hose and didn’t put it back on top of all this he left all our gates open and wire clippings on our dog run.

If it wasn’t for the discount they provided us for the part delays we experienced I would have provided a lower rating.

reviews.Name: Dixie Bacon
reviews.Description: Thomas Cruz was very professional and polite. Clean up area he worked in. Last time the guy left a mess. If I could I would give him a 10.

reviews.Name: SAM AYYOUB
reviews.Description: At This place GUNDLACH’s came a beautiful knowledgable human being coming to our home wyth expertiseness and a goal tO fix the issue. And after the part delivers comes in, and then he will finish his profession. Keeping America warm in the winter tymes and cool in the summer tymes!!. Thanks again to the professional and thank you GUNDALACH’S you da bomb baby!!.

reviews.Name: C.M. Clancy
reviews.Description:
I called on 4/12/24 after 3:30pm and Anthony G. was dispatched on 4/13 in the AM. He was on time, replaced seal on leaking toilet. He was very capable, courteous, and informative. I give him 5 stars!

on 4/15/24 Robert was dispatched for my scheduled work on cooler and heating unit that is under the "Gundlach's Comfort Club" service (worth every penny). He arrived on time, completed all work in a timely manner, very pleasant and courteous and made sure all work was completed satisfactorily. He gets 5 stars also!

I have used Gundlach's for many years and found them to be reliable, stand behind their work...very uncommon in this day and age.

reviews.Name: Frank Bacus
reviews.Description: Adrian was very thorough and job oriented checking out the HVAC furnace.  Another plus replacing the air filters.

review_summary:
*   **Positive:** Technicians praised for being on time, professional, courteous, thorough, and informative (Alexander Elkins, Michael K, Anthony, Thomas Cruz, Robert, and Adrian).
*   **Positive:** Membership (Care Club and Comfort Club) provides peace of mind and value.
*   **Positive:** Company is reliable and stands behind their work.
*   **Negative:** One customer experienced communication issues and unprofessional behavior from a technician (entering without knocking, using homeowner's hose, leaving gates open, and leaving debris).

title: Do It Right Plumbing & Drain Cleaning

reviews.Name: Pirate Orona
reviews.Description: I had an emergency and needed the water to my swamp cooler shut off but couldn't find the shut off valve. I have a fear of falling and couldn't get on my roof. I called at like 5/6 in the morning. I started to leave a message and someone picked up before I even finished my first sentence... They gave me a reasonable early time to help me... I am recovering from a slew of mental health issues and Brian made me feel like a proper customer without judgement. He talked to me professionally and got the job done extremely quick. He explained everything and let me know they will come back if it isn't corrected, but it's already apparent that he fixed it. He even showed me the issues as best he could.. Even the lady on the phone who took my payment was so sweet. I seriously can't thank them enough. Probably will be my number one plumber from here on out

reviews.Name: jenifer flores
reviews.Description:
🔧 Thank You, Do It Right Plumbing! 🔧

I recently found myself in a moment of real panic—my pipe had been run over, and I didn’t know where to turn. It’s been three years since I lost Ramiro, and though time has passed, I still find myself wanting to run to him any time something goes wrong. My husband was my savior in every aspect of life—he supported, protected, and provided for me in ways big and small. Facing these moments without him isn’t easy, but I remembered meeting some amazing people, Jack and his wife, through networking, so I reached out to them.

Jack and his team came out quickly and not only fixed the problem but patiently explained everything along the way. They walked me through the issue, gave me different options to handle it, and even let me linger as I tried to wrap my head around how to prevent something like this in the future. I’m still learning how to be “the adult” now, as funny as that may sound. My husband truly spoiled me, and while life looks different now, I’m incredibly grateful for the relief they provided.

Knowing I have one less thing to worry about, despite everything else going on, is a gift I don’t take lightly. Thank you, Do It Right Plumbing, for your expertise, kindness, and the peace of mind you’ve given me.

reviews.Name: julissa avila
reviews.Description: I called for my kitchen sink and had someone out within the hour. The did a free inspection, then told me the price to unclog and service the sink. The 2 men that worked on it were friendly, knowledgeable and quick. I was happy with the price, efficiency and overall experience. Would definitely recommend using this business!

reviews.Name: Lizeth Sanchez
reviews.Description: I had to do it right plumbing come out for an emergency job they were prompt very fair pricing took care of the problem I am truly happy with their services thank you Jack you're the best you are my plumber for life

reviews.Name: Erika Cota
reviews.Description: After attempting to contact several plumbers and help for our leaking issue, Do it Right Plumbing was the only one that responded to us immediately. They came out next day, gave us a quote that was affordable and completed the work the same day!! I can't emphasize how important that was. The entire team that entered my house were respectful and make me feel better that they were going to fix the problem. Efficient, great customer service , and excellent work. I will refer Do it Right plumbing to everyone I know . Thank you again !

reviews.Name: David Rosen
reviews.Description: Agreement service , great team of people, Jack took great care of me, had a plumbing emergency and he was Johmny on the spot , and fair pricing. He explained the whole process to me and treated me kindly.

reviews.Name: koko kalenian
reviews.Description: I needed tankless water heater I did call jack the owner, he was very knowledgeable great help and personality, installed everything as it was promised great job I do highly recommend this business

reviews.Name: Jose Jacinto
reviews.Description: After I hit my gas meter, I needed my water heated purged from the water and gas. I called them. They were quick to respond. Everything was fixed and his guy checked for leaks as well. I couldn’t asked for better service, and I will be using them again..

owner.name: Do It Right Plumbing & Drain Cleaning (Owner)

review_summary:
*   **Excellent customer service:** Prompt responses, friendly and respectful technicians, and clear communication.
*   **Efficient and quick service:** Fast response times, same-day service, and efficient work.
*   **Fair pricing:** Reasonable and affordable quotes.
*   **Knowledgeable and professional:** Technicians explain issues and solutions thoroughly.
*   **Emergency service:** Available for emergency situations.
*   **Wide range of services:** Handles various plumbing issues, including drain cleaning, pipe repair, water heater installation, and gas meter issues.
*   **Positive experiences:** Customers highly recommend the business and plan to use them again.

title: Cisneros Brothers Plumbing | Emergency Plumber, Drain Cleaning, Tankless Water Heater Repair and Installation Bakersfield, CA

reviews.Name: Michelle Rubio
reviews.Description: Since I recently contacted Cisneros Brothers Plumbing for a leaking water heater and company was quick to respond and did an excellent job on fixing my water heater, garbage disposal and clogged tub. I contacted them again for my toilet that wasn’t flushing correctly. Rene was here within the hour and replaced my lines and toilet. They did a great job and were quick to get the job done. I am very happy with their service!

reviews.Name: Melissa Oats
reviews.Description: Another excellent visit by Renee at Cisneros Bros. They are our go-to plumbers! Renee is always very personable and courteous in his approach. He is very knowledgeable and always gives us many options to choose from. Cisneros Bros. has different levels of plans and services. They’re AWESOME!!!

reviews.Name: steven aquino
reviews.Description: Our technician was very meticulous about how clean he left our pipes. Our previous tenant would pour a lot of grease down the kitchen sink and it had 10 years of grease buildup. I will definitely call them back. We'll worth the price you pay.

reviews.Name: Nancy Miranda
reviews.Description: Rene was an excellent help and was super nicee !!! , fixed our water heater and fixed our fillvalve totally recommend CISNERO BROTHERS PLUMBING !!! 10/10

reviews.Name: Dylan Raphael
reviews.Description: Guillermo did an excellent job fixing complicated plumbing issues and leaks at my property. Christian was excellent breaking down different options before we committed to the right solution. Great communication and prompt service.

reviews.Name: Kammi Vergara
reviews.Description:
Excellent service by the techs! On time the communication of updates on texts calls and emails on point! Promptly service when I called, the girls in the office answered all my questions! Affordable price! Keep up the good work guys!  Christian thanks so much for all your help!
10/10 will recommend and call them back for future repairs!

reviews.Name: Daniel Sanchez
reviews.Description: Alex Guillen replaced our water heater and replaced our water shut off valve. He was friendly, attentive and we are over the moon excited with the job he provided. We recommend Alex to anyone that needs plumbing services and will definitely request him again in the future.

reviews.Name: Dianne Penaloza
reviews.Description: Derryl and Benjamin were on time, very professional and knowledgeable. We had a great experience with their work. We will definitely keep hiring Cisneros Brothers plumbing for our plumbing needs and we will refer them to our friends and family! We are truly happy customers!

owner.name: Cisneros Brothers Plumbing | Emergency Plumber, Drain Cleaning, Tankless Water Heater Repair and Installation Bakersfield, CA (Owner)

review_summary: Cisneros Brothers Plumbing receives consistently positive reviews. Customers praise their quick response times, professionalism, and knowledgeable technicians. Specific mentions include excellent work on water heaters, garbage disposals, toilets, and drain cleaning. Technicians like Rene, Guillermo, Christian, and Alex are frequently commended for their service, communication, and helpfulness. Customers appreciate the clear explanations of options, cleanliness, and affordable pricing. Many reviewers express high satisfaction and indicate they would recommend and reuse the company's services.

title: Homespun Plumbing

reviews.Name: Vicente Acuna
reviews.Description: I had a great experience with Homespun Plumbing. My garbage disposal broke down and I wasn't sure the extent of the damage but was expecting to fully replace it. I called Homespun Plumbing and Anthony was willing to talk out a quick fix in case it was jammed. I didn't have an allen wrench so I couldn't fix it. Anthony came over the same day and took care of it and even left me an extra allen wrench! He was competent and super respectful, I would highly recommend Homespun Plumbing.

reviews.Name: Jennifer Mayfield
reviews.Description: Homespun plumbing is amazing! Prompt messaging back, same day appointment. Anthony showed up at the exact time he said, was knowledgeable and professional. We will be using Homespun for all our plumbing needs. I will recommend him to all our family and friends.

reviews.Name: Marshall Dunn
reviews.Description: We had an issue with our dishwasher and several of our faucets. Anthony was very prompt, kind, and helpful. He identified the problems right away (they were super simple), he pointed out the issues and the easy remedies and didn’t even charge us for the quick trip! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

reviews.Name: Karen Mejia
reviews.Description: I am very happy with the quality of work that Homespun Plumbing provided. My new water heater is working perfectly, and I know that I can count on Anthony if I ever have need any plumbing work completed in the future. I would highly recommend Homespun Plumbing to anyone who needs plumbing services

reviews.Name: Jesse Ramirez
reviews.Description: Anthony was excellent from start to finish. He explained everything before he did any work and also made sure that my family’s needs came first. I would not recommend any plumber to my friends and family unless it is Anthony. I will definitely be using this company as my only plumber from here on out

reviews.Name: Rebekah Hill
reviews.Description: Anthony is amazing! Repiped our home (also fixed many leaks prior) and did a great job! Always fair with pricing and excellent customer service. Thank you!!

reviews.Name: JJ Management
reviews.Description: Homespun Plumbing came to fix our ice machine and replace some water lines. They really can do it all! Anthony was professional, efficient, and very reasonably priced. We will call him again for any of our plumbing needs.

reviews.Name: Snow Wolves
reviews.Description:
I highly recommend Homespun Plumbing. Anthony has been here three separate times, to fix a clogged toilet, inspect and repair a leaking pipe, and just today, did the recommended annual water heater flush.

Anthony was kind, professional, respectful, and most importantly, comfortable and easy to communicate with. He was knowledgeable, fair in pricing, and reliable. I'm a stickler for great customer service and follow through, so definitely would hire again.

review_summary: Homespun Plumbing, specifically Anthony, receives consistently positive reviews. Customers praise his promptness, professionalism, knowledge, and fair pricing. He's described as respectful, kind, and easy to communicate with. Anthony handles a variety of plumbing issues, from minor repairs to major installations, and is highly recommended for all plumbing needs.

title: Liberty Plumbing- Septic And Portable Restroom Service

reviews.Name: Mark Lewyn
reviews.Description: Very impressed by all the positive reviews and nice comments about the owner, Alex. He sounds like a good guy. Keep up the good work!  That said, I see the website is down. What is the best way to reach Alex by email?

reviews.Name: jenifer flores
reviews.Description:
"I had a fantastic experience with Alex and his family. After waiting two weeks for a service from another company that missed multiple appointments, I reached out to Alex this morning. They arrived the same day to provide service.

The work was efficient and tidy, and their communication was outstanding. The customer service was top-notch.

I highly recommend them!"

reviews.Name: John Jimerson
reviews.Description: We had a main line issue on the weekend that no one else could seem to fix.    Alex came out got us going again.   Very professional and straight forward.   Let's you know what to expect and gives you options.  I highly recommend Liberty Plumbing.

reviews.Name: Dusti Mcdaris
reviews.Description: Short notice was not a problem, excellent service! Definitely would recommend this service to anyone shopping around! Very happy with the quote received, very affordable. Thank you Liberty Plumbing for your immediate help with our need for septic pumping.

reviews.Name: Michele Magyar
reviews.Description: Alex came up to Posey, California to assist with our plugged septic system. Used a 300 pound snake & was able to unplug the clog. Highly recommend Liberty Plumbing & Septic.

reviews.Name: Bob Trammell
reviews.Description:
The plumber arrived at the end of the time window I was quoted.  It took 2 hours to repair a short piece of copper pipe and install a new hose bib.  Everything seems to work.  However, he sent me to the hardware store to purchase a new hose bib as he did not have the part.

Now the surprise - $480 for a little less than 2 hours work.  This didn't involve a lot of parts, digging, or anything else.  I had a hose bib I could not remove and a bent copper pipe behind it.  The pipe was outside the house.  $480 just seems WAY out of line - that comes to $240/hour!

I don't understand this company's good rating.  I admit, I was in a hurry and didn't shop around.  I will not use them again and would recommend that other's go elsewhere, as well!

reviews.Name: Leeroy Abrego
reviews.Description: Alex from Liberty plumbing came out over the weekend with no hesitation… pumped my septic system… 10/10 I’d recommend them 👍 Great communication, Thanks again Alex !

reviews.Name: Paola Gonsalez
reviews.Description: Excellent work , great customer service, I called them for a septic cleaning and they here quick and got the job done definitely recommend them

owner.name: Liberty Plumbing- Septic And Portable Restroom Service (Owner)

review_summary:
*   **Positive:** Alex (owner) and Liberty Plumbing are praised for:
    *   Excellent service, communication, and customer service.
    *   Responsiveness, including same-day service and weekend availability.
    *   Professionalism and straightforward approach.
    *   Affordable quotes.
    *   Effectively resolving septic and plumbing issues (main line, septic pumping, clogs).
*   **Negative:** One review reports:
    *   High cost ($480 for less than 2 hours of work)
    *   Having to purchase a part (hose bib) themselves.
*   **Other:** Website is down.

title: A3 Plumbing Repair & Services

reviews.Name: Deanna Avila
reviews.Description: We highly recommend A3 plumbing repair & services! We needed a plumber fast for a busted water line and the service we got was excellent and he came so quickly.  Thank you, we will definitely be using this company again and referring family and friends.

reviews.Name: Chandra Craven
reviews.Description: Thank you so much to Homero at A3 plumbing! We needed the refrigerator hooked up for the ice maker and cold water! Such a professional and very prompt! I just made one phone call and less than an hour the problem was solved! Thank you again Homero, David and I will be calling you for all of our plumbing needs and repairs!

reviews.Name: Cas C
reviews.Description: I was having issues with my water heater and needed it replaced. Homero replaced my water heater and was great about explaining what the service entailed and even went over what he did after he finished installing the new water heater. He went above and beyond to make sure it was correctly done. I would highly recommend his services!

reviews.Name: Alan Scott
reviews.Description: Great service dosnt cost....it pays!  Working with a huge plumbing company has always let to higher costs and weak communications. It's the smaller local companies that support our community and provide one on one service. A3 is your go to solution in Kern County.    Because of the seamless interaction its like a day at the beach.

reviews.Name: karla G
reviews.Description: Excellent service! The plumber was prompt, worked efficiently, and left everything spotless. He completed the job quickly and at a very fair price. Highly recommend for anyone looking for fast, clean, and affordable plumbing services!

reviews.Name: Sarah L
reviews.Description: I had a great experience! They came on time, communicated well , and answered all my questions. The price was very reasonable and I wasn’t pressured into adding services. They were honest and reliable!

reviews.Name: Bunnyline Frenchies
reviews.Description:
Really great plumber. I had another plumber come out to try and unclog my drain and he was unsuccessful. I called A3 plumbing and he came out the same day & did everything he could to help me locate the clog even though it was a little tough finding it he found it and unclogged it. He’s a really great guy. Definitely will be calling on him and his son again for any plumbing needs

Appreciate it Brother 🙏🏽

reviews.Name: Linda Lynd
reviews.Description: A3 Plumbing did a phenomenonal job on two repair items.  The service was fast, prompt, fair, he provided his recommendations and our options. He communicated his next steps every step of the way. I highly recommend A3 Plumbing for your Plumbing needs.

review_summary:
*   **Positive experiences:** Fast, prompt, excellent, professional, efficient, clean, and affordable service.
*   **Key attributes:** Reliable, honest, communicative, and provided clear explanations.
*   **Services mentioned:** Water line repair, refrigerator hookup, water heater replacement, drain unclogging, and general plumbing repairs.
*   **Overall recommendation:** Highly recommended for plumbing needs.

title: Rescue Hero Plumbing & Pumping

reviews.Name: Dr. George Ripsom
reviews.Description: I went to the garage and found my old water heater leaking. I called and they arrived a couple hours later. They did all work necessary to get at the heater, replaced it, removed the old one, and restored the access. Very quick, efficient, and great value.

reviews.Name: Chris Cierley
reviews.Description:
Fairly certain I got taken today.  I've used this company in the past and they were reasonable before, today the cost was double what was paid in the past.  A little more for working the weekend was acceptable, but when my tank was pumped  I was was told, "once their truck was full, if I wanted the job completed, it'd cost me an additional $300 for them to come back and finish".  I wasn't told about this additional cost before  the job started, only after the job was half done.  What choice did I have at that point. Looks like from other reviews, I'm not the only one overcharged for "services".

Quoted $675 for a weekend call which was understandable, and an additional $200 for the acid which I was ok with, but ended up having to pay $1,200 to have the job completed.

reviews.Name: Lori Martin
reviews.Description: I do not recommend. They didn’t even pump out the other side of septic. I had to empty 2 years later because of this. I got ripped off and also ripped me off by charging 200 to pour liquid. Almost 1,000$ for what exactly…

reviews.Name: Liliana Garcia
reviews.Description: Showed up very fast once I called for a water heater repair. Work was done very well and in a timely maner

reviews.Name: Cyndi Benson
reviews.Description:
I can't say enough good things about  this Company and the people I spoke with from the office to the gentleman that came out to the house. I had so many dumb questions and they were very patient and answered all of them. Everyone was kind!!!!

The 2 gentleman that came out were very polite and patient, I would recommend them to anyone I talk to!!!!!! They were very affordable and didn't try to cheat me like the last compant I used.

Thank you for all your help!!!!

Cyndi Benson and Charles Brewster

reviews.Name: Jacqueline Fottler
reviews.Description: They are AMAZING!!! I can’t thank them enough ! They are amazing call them !! I’m never calling anyone else for plumbing again !!! Westein I probably spelled that wrong I’m sorry in advance for that but he amazing!!! He will get the job done !!

reviews.Name: Dawn Swainston
reviews.Description: I was skeptical at first when they pick up because they just say “plumbing service” but lost that skepticism quickly when Westin showed up an hour later. He is very professional and even took it like a champ when my 2 80lb puppies jumped him in the kitchen! Made me feel like a dang fool (in a good way) with how easy the fixes were. Would & have definitely recommended! Thanks!!

reviews.Name: Vanessa Martinez
reviews.Description: Had placed an emergency call for our little league today during our busiest game day of the week. They were quick to arrive and got us up running again in no time. Very professional and prompt. Would use them again and recommend them.

review_summary: Rescue Hero Plumbing & Pumping receives mixed reviews. Positive feedback highlights quick response times, efficient work, fair pricing (in some cases), professionalism, and friendly service. Negative reviews cite instances of overcharging, hidden fees, incomplete work, and poor communication regarding costs.

title: The Honest Plumber

reviews.Name: Fernando Torres
reviews.Description:
I just spent half of my day today 3/22/25 pulling my dishwasher out and checking everything that I could think of that would cause it to spill water all over my kitchen every time we tried to use it in the last two weeks. I was even making plans to put in a service request with my home warranty company. I reinstalled it and it was still doing the same thing. I did some more research on YouTube and checked one last thing…… and wouldn’t you know it….two weeks ago I had a technician from The Honest Plumber come out to replace my garbage disposal (through our home warranty company). This technician did not remove the plug  from the port on the garbage disposal before attaching the return line to it. That’s why my dishwasher was making a mess in my kitchen every time. Needless to say I’m pretty ticked off over it. I drilled a hole through the plug and used a wire hook to pull the plug out, reconnected the line and the dishwasher is back to normal. Of course I called my home warranty company to complain and all they can do is file some form to send to The Honest Plumber.  Maybe revisit some fundamentals with the younger technicians? My wife said it only took him a few minutes to install the garbage disposal but he obviously did not check his own work. Not a fan.
P.S.
Thank you YouTube, you saved me from paying a $125 service fee for someone to come check out my dishwasher. I think I might just cancel my account with my home warranty company. This is not the first time I have had issues with their selected service providers, but first time with this one.  Rant over!

reviews.Name: Daniel Long
reviews.Description: My home warranty dispatched honest plumber I had a clogged kitchen sink pipe that was leaking and garbage disposal that was leaking the plumber was really professional and knowledgeable and took care of my situation, repair taken of by honest plumber more than happy with honest plumber definitely would recommend them for your plumbing needs.

reviews.Name: Tammy Watts
reviews.Description: This is the best company that was dispatched to fix our plumbing issues. Cares about the work they do and it’s not a rush job!! Quality work and very professional.  By far the best service we’ve ever had!!! Everyone was nice!!! From the Secretary Janessa, Brandon came out first to see what needed done and then Mike came and finished the work and made sure I was happy with all that was done!!! This business is the best!!!

reviews.Name: Joshua Luchau
reviews.Description: They were able to come out quickly, asses the problem and get things fixed in very short order. The Plumber was very nice and the prices were absolutely reasonable. In fact compared to the competitor who wanted to charge me $500 more for the same job, I felt like I had just won the lottery. Thanks again for all the help.

reviews.Name: Mandy R
reviews.Description:
I definitely do not recommend The “Honest” Plumber! Our water heater needed to be replaced so we went through our home warranty and they sent a technician from this company out. The time slot for our appointment was 8-12 and of course Tyler was running late. When he finally arrived I was told the job would take about an hour to an hour and half. He struggled to get the job done, I have cameras in my backyard and he really seemed to not know what he was doing looking back at the footage he looked extremely confused. He struggled for about 4 hours needing to leave and come back with more parts. Then at the end of the day he knocks on the door to tell me that in order to use the hot water heater I needed an extension cord to run from there to the closest power outlet about 5 feet away from the water heater. Also turned out he needed to come back the following day to finish the job. He asked what time worked for me and we made the appointment for 10am.
The follow day 10am rolled around 10:30 comes and he was a no show. No phone call or anything so I called him and no answer. I finally call the office and the lady who answered the phone told me he was in Tehachapi and he had said he could come at the end of the day. I was not comfortable with that because I didn’t trust him to come finish the job being that he has already lied at this point. Finally at about 4:30 a different technician comes to finish the job and again we are responsible for finding an electrician to place a power outlet for the unit to be plugged in. We were not told this prior to getting the work done! So now we have an extension cord running outside just so we can have hot water. Tyler has ignored my husband’s multiple calls. This is an extremely shady business that cares nothing for their customers. Stay away from this sorry company!

reviews.Name: Rhiannon Beltran
reviews.Description: These plumbers where assigned by our insurance company to install a moen flo. The install costs us an extra seven hundred dollars due a small pipe that they said needed to be replace. When I ask for receipt. They did not have a pen for their invoice. Nor did they ask and they wrote it in highlighter. They didn't put the prices of parts or labor. It took him less then an hour. In addition they were supposed to let our insurance company know that it was installed and turn in paper work to the insurance company that is was completed. They never did and it wasn't reported to our insurance. We almost were dropped from our insurance because of this. If you get a moan flow by your insurance do not let them assign you this plumber.

reviews.Name: Bunnyline Frenchies
reviews.Description:
These plumbers are a joke. I was assigned them through my home warranty company American Home Shield. I had a clogged drain. I paid my service fee of $125. The plumber came out and snaked my shower & told me he couldn’t get the clog undone. He asked if I had a main drain clean out. I let him know I didn’t know if I did because I was never shown one when I moved into the house. We both walked around my house and I showed him a box that had an opening under it that we never knew what it was . So he proceeded to take off the lid and tell me “oh no that’s not the main drain clean out” he told me if we pay extra money he could go on the roof and snake my vent from the roof but I had to pay extra because the warranty company doesn’t cover him going on the roof. I told him it’s ok , I’ll think about it . He left and we had to hire another plumber at (A3 plumbing) the next day of $225. Which he was awesome. He came out and did the same , snaked my shower and my main drain vent on my roof , he couldn’t get the clog unclogged. So he was determined to find my main drain clean out the one that’s on the ground , we looked for a while of trying to find it with no success at first. So we started looking once more and I took him over to the same exact box I showed the plumber from The Honest Plumber & he lifted the lid and right away said “dude this is your main drain clean out”

So I would never hire any plumber from this company. How could u look at the main drain clean out and tell me that’s not it. That’s literally the basic info you should know as a plumber is how to identify a main drain clean out.

reviews.Name: Genn Ramirez
reviews.Description: I got them contracted and through American home shield. I got hung up on. We didn’t have a shower for weeks. The man that I talked to was rude on the phone and not personable in person. Said he would come back to finish the job and I didn’t hear back at all. I had gave him 1000$ in cash and didn’t hear anything after 2 weeks, I called them and I guess I got pushed to the done pile.

review_summary:
*   **Mixed Reviews:** The Honest Plumber receives a mix of positive and negative feedback.
*   **Positive:** Some customers report professional, knowledgeable, and efficient service, with reasonable prices. One customer was very happy with the service and highly recommends them.
*   **Negative:**
    *   Several complaints about poor workmanship, including a garbage disposal installation error that caused a dishwasher malfunction.
    *   Issues with water heater installations, including delays, lack of knowledge, and needing to provide an extension cord.
    *   Problems with communication, missed appointments, and failure to complete jobs.
    *   Concerns about billing practices, including lack of itemized receipts and failure to communicate with insurance companies.
    *   A plumber misidentifying a main drain clean out.
    *   Rude customer service and failure to follow up on unfinished work.
